alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 11:01AM EST until February 20 at 2:50PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 28.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM EST Sunday was 31.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 16.1 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 28.6 feet on 05/10/2009. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM EST Sunday.
